org.jboss.windup.reporting.config.classification

Class Classification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.DefaultOperationBuilder
      • org.jboss.windup.config.operation.GraphOperation
        • org.jboss.windup.config.operation.iteration.AbstractIterationOperation<T>
          • org.jboss.windup.config.parameters.ParameterizedIterationOperation<FileModel>
            • org.jboss.windup.reporting.config.classification.Classification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationAs, ClassificationDescription, ClassificationEffort, ClassificationLink, ClassificationSeverity, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Operation, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.param.Parameterized

    public class Classification
extends ParameterizedIterationOperation<FileModel>
implements ClassificationAs, ClassificationEffort, ClassificationDescription, ClassificationLink, ClassificationSeverity
    Classifies a FileModel Iteration payload.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Method Detail

      • resolvePayload

        public FileModel resolvePayload(GraphRewrite event,
                       org.ocpsoft.rewrite.context.EvaluationContext context,
                       WindupVertexFrame payload)
        Set the payload to the fileModel of the given instance even though the variable is not directly referencing it. This is mainly to simplify the creation of the rule, when the FileModel itself is not being iterated but just a model referencing it.
        Overrides:
        resolvePayload in class AbstractIterationOperation<FileModel>

      • withEffort

        public Classification withEffort(int effort)
        Description copied from interface: ClassificationAs
        Specify the effort that that represents the level of effort required to fix the object. Use this only if you don't want to specify description nor any extra link.
        Specified by:
        withEffort in interface ClassificationAs
        Specified by:
        withEffort in interface ClassificationDescription
        Specified by:
        withEffort in interface ClassificationLink
        Specified by:
        withEffort in interface ClassificationSeverity
        Parameters:
        effort - Effort needed to be put. Will be used to count story points for the whole application.
        Returns:
        next step of Classification definition
        See Also:
        ClassificationAs.withEffort(int)
